          <title>
            <string language="en">Dissolving solids in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auflösende Körper im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solides de dissolution dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sólidos dissolvendo-se na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Solidi di dissoluzione in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλύοντας στερεά στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sólidos que disuelven en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that dissolving solids in water is a reversible process.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physical change</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm stellt dar, daß das, Körper im 
Wasser aufzulösen ein umschaltbarer Prozeß ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre que cela la dissolution des 
solides dans l'eau est un processus réversible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que isso dissolver sólidos 
na água é um processo reversível.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra che quello dissolvere i 
solidi in acqua è un processo rovesciabile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι η διάλυση των στερεών 
στο ύδωρ είναι μια αντιστρέψιμη διαδικασία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que eso disolver los 
sólidos en agua es un proceso reversible.</string>
          </description>
